battle_traits.name: Dirty Tricks
battle_traits.effect:
Your army can use 1 Dirty Trick ability per phase. The effect of a Dirty Trick ability is only applied if you make a successful dirty trick roll. The success of a dirty trick roll depends on the number of Dirty Trick abilities your army has already used this battle round.

Dirty Trick: Dirty Trick Roll
First: 2+
Second: 3+
Third: 4+
Fourth or subsequent: 5+

battle_traits.name: Venom-encrusted Weapons
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Kruleboyz Infantry unit to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
battle_traits.effect: Until the start of your next turn, the target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

battle_traits.name: Sneaky Sneakin'
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Movement Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick a friendly Kruleboyz Infantry unit that has 10 or fewer models and is not in combat to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
battle_traits.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 3" of a terrain feature and more than 9" from all enemy units.

battle_traits.name: Lethal Surprise
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with any friendly Kruleboyz units to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
battle_traits.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. In addition, for the rest of the turn, the target’s weapons cannot be affected by the Charge (+1 Damage) weapon ability.

battle_traits.name: Noisy Racket
battle_traits.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battle_traits.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with any friendly Kruleboyz units to be the target, then make a dirty trick roll.
battle_traits.effect: The target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

Kruleboyz Klaw.name: Swamp Shroud
Kruleboyz Klaw.effect: Friendly Kruleboyz units that are wholly within 3" of a terrain feature are not visible to enemy units that are more than 12" away from them.

Light Finga.name: Ded Sneaky
Light Finga.effect: You can use the ‘Sneaky Sneakin'’ Dirty Trick ability twice per turn instead of only once per turn.

Middul Finga.name: Far-killa Bolts
Middul Finga.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly Man‑skewer Boltboyz or Beast-skewer Killbow units to be the targets.
Middul Finga.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 3" to the Range characteristic of the targets’ ranged weapons.

Trophy Finga.name: Meanest Beasts
Trophy Finga.effect: Companion weapons used by friendly Kruleboyz units have Crit (2 Hits).

heroic_traits.name: Slippery Skumbag
heroic_traits.effect: If this unit is in combat, roll a dice. On a 3+, it can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

heroic_traits.name: Backstabba
heroic_traits.declare: Pick an enemy Hero in combat with both this unit and another friendly Kruleboyz unit to be the target.
heroic_traits.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Add 1 to the mortal damage inflicted for each friendly Kruleboyz unit in combat with the target in addition to the first two Kruleboyz units.

heroic_traits.name: Egomaniak
heroic_traits.effect:
While this unit is within the combat range of a friendly non-Hero Kruleboyz Infantry unit:

• This unit has Ward (4+).
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for this unit, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly non-Hero Kruleboyz Infantry unit within this unit’s combat range after the damage sequence for this unit has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

artefacts_of_power.name: Swamp Staff
artefacts_of_power.effect: If this unit is not a Wizard, it can use the ‘Unbind’ ability as if it had Wizard (1). Otherwise, add 1 to this unit’s power level.

artefacts_of_power.name: Eye-biter Ash
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts_of_power.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts_of_power.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls and wound rolls for attacks made by the target for the rest of the turn.

artefacts_of_power.name: Mork's Eye Pebble
artefacts_of_power.activation: Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared an Attack ability
artefacts_of_power.effect: For the rest of the turn, friendly Kruleboyz units have Ward (5+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

Lore of the Swamp.name: Da Black Pit
Lore of the Swamp.declare: Pick a friendly Kruleboyz Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Swamp.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

Lore of the Swamp.name: Mork's Kunnin'
Lore of the Swamp.declare: Pick a friendly Kruleboyz Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly Kruleboyz unit wholly within 12" of them, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Swamp.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that friendly unit.

Lore of the Swamp.name: Choking Mist
Lore of the Swamp.declare: Pick a friendly Kruleboyz Wizard to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit wholly within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Lore of the Swamp.effect: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s weapons until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Skewering Bolts
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Beast-skewer Bolts is 6 if the target is a Monster.

abilities.name: Pick 'Em Off
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a Move ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Killaboss with Stab-grot

abilities.name: Unleash the Stab-grot!
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects:

• Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target. Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.
• This unit has Ward (5+) for the rest of the turn.

After resolving either effect, remove this unit’s Stab-grot from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Stab-grot
abilities.effect: This unit’s Stab-grot is a token. If this unit’s Stab-grot has been removed, it can no longer attack with its Stab-grot’s Shiv and it cannot use the ‘Unleash the Stab-grot!’ ability.

abilities.name: Keep 'Em In Line
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared the ‘All-out Attack’ command for a friendly Kruleboyz Infantry unit
abilities.effect: If this unit is wholly within 12" of the unit using the ‘All-out Attack’ command, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by that unit for the rest of the phase.

warscrolls.notes: This Hero can join an eligible regiment as a Mob Wrangler.

abilities.name: All Part of Da Plan
abilities.declare: Pick another friendly Kruleboyz unit wholly within 9" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the target’s control score until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: That's Ours, Ya Gitz!
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective you do not control, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly Kruleboyz Infantry units wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of The Dread Mace is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: The Shield Inviolate
abilities.activation: Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per Spell ability.

abilities.name: Rampaging Destruction
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.effect:
If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:

• Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.
• Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 x 6).

abilities.name: The End of Empires
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly Destruction units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Avatar of Destruction
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: On Da March
abilities.effect: While they are wholly within 12" of this unit, friendly Kruleboyz Infantry units can use Charge abilities even if they used a Run ability in the same turn.

abilities.name: Klutcha-grot
abilities.effect: This unit’s Klutcha-grot is a token. If it is removed from the battlefield, this unit cannot use the ‘A Tough Grot to Swallow’ ability.

abilities.name: Bait and Trap
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if the target is damaged. On a 3+, the target has Strike-last for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: A Tough Grot To Swallow
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a Rampage ability for an enemy Monster within 6" of this unit
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, that Rampage ability has no effect. On a 1, remove this unit’s Klutcha-grot from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Easy Meat
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy model in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll for each model in this unit within 1" of the target. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, it is slain.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.effect: Heal (D3) this unit.

abilities.name: Breaka-harness
abilities.effect: Allocate D3 damage points to this unit (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). For each damage point allocated to this unit by this ability, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Mirebrute’s Clubs for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Tear Limb From Limb
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Infantry unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Kountin' Krew
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Hobgrot Slittaz unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the battle, the target’s Slitta-knives have Crit (Mortal) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Bet-master
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit on the battlefield to be the bet.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by this unit and friendly Hobgrot Slittaz units that target the bet.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Sloppklaw’s Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Aggravate Wounds
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy Monster in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the number of damage points the target has. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Breath of the Mire-drakes
abilities.declare: Pick each enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 1, this ability has no effect. On a 2-5, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. On a 6, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Power of Kragnos
abilities.effect: Friendly Kruleboyz units have Ward (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Man-skewer Crossbows
abilities.effect: Each time this unit uses a Shoot ability, pick either the Hasty Shot or Aimed Shot weapon characteristics for all the attacks it makes with its Man‑skewer Crossbows.

abilities.name: Pick 'Em Off
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a Move ability this turn and was not set up this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Roar of Kragnos
abilities.declare: If this unit’s Hurrk da Howla is on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Scrap-bang
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• Inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
• This unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Sludgeraker’s Talons is 4.

abilities.name: Sludgeraker Venom
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-Hero Kruleboyz unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s weapons that have Crit (Mortal). On a 1, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Festering Wounds
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s combat attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a D3. On a 2+:
• Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
• Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks made by the target until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Killabeak’s Talons and Beak is 5.

abilities.name: Screamin' Mandrakk
abilities.activation: Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared a Spell ability
abilities.effect: This unit uses the ‘Unbind’ ability but the unbinding roll is 3D6 instead of 2D6.

abilities.name: Mork Sez No!
abilities.effect: Each time this unit unbinds a spell, inflict D3 mortal damage on the caster. If the unbinding roll was 10+, inflict D6 mortal damage on the caster instead.

abilities.name: Strangle Hex
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the target’s Health characteristic, to a maximum of 10. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Crush to Death
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Foul Elixirs
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly Kruleboyz Infantry unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, add 1 to save rolls for the target for the rest of the turn. On a 1-2, allocate D3 damage points to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

abilities.name: Pot-grot
abilities.effect: This unit’s Pot-grot is a token. Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit while its Pot-grot is on the battlefield. If you make an unmodified casting roll of 4 or less for this unit, remove its Pot-grot from the battlefield.

abilities.name: Scare Taktikz
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by non-Hero units that target this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Battle Damage
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Vulcha’s Talons and Beak is 5.

abilities.name: Commanding View
abilities.activation: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly Gutrippaz unit wholly within 12" of this unit
abilities.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.

abilities.name: Vulcha Dive
abilities.activation: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a number of dice equal to the unmodified charge roll. For each 4+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
